# init(texture:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new unlit material with the provided color texture.

## Declaration

```swift
init(texture: TextureResource)
```

## Creating an unlit material

- **init()**: Creates an unlit material.
- **init(applyPostProcessToneMap:)**: Creates an UnlitMaterial with the given tone mapping setting
